item.description:
***Sorry there was a mistake in the event description -- the13th is a Tuesday. I made a scheduling error as I had promised to do some Wednesdays but since I already have RSVPs I will leave it as Tuesday. I have scheduled out some more meetups in the summer and have included Wednesdays.***

Our April meetup will be held on Tuesday, April 13th from 7-8:30pm. Be sure to mark it on your calendar.

Hope you all can make it.

Tara
item.how_to_find_us: We usually meet in the front room given space. I'll have a sign laying on the table.

group.name: The Boston Metrowest French Language Meetup

item.name: APRIL MEETUP
